text: Hyundai Motor Company has produced the following families of automobile engines. * Spark Ignition (Gasoline) ** Straight-3 *** Kappa κ - 1.0 L ** Straight-4 *** Epsilon ε - 0.8/1.0/1.1 L *** Kappa κ - 1.2/1.25/1.4/1.6 L *** Alpha α - 1.3/1.4/1.5/1.6 L *** Beta β - 1.6/1.8/2.0 L *** Gamma γ - 1.4/1.6 L *** Nu ν - 1.8/2.0 L *** Theta θ - 1.8/2.0/2.4 L ** V6 *** Delta Δ - 2.5/2.7 L *** Mu μ - 2.7 L *** Sigma Σ - 3.0/3.5 L *** Lambda Λ - 3.0/3.3/3.5/3.8 L ** V8 *** Omega Ω - 4.5 L *** Tau τ - 4.6/5.0 L * Compression Ignition (Diesel) **Straight-3 ***U - 1.1 L ***D4B- 1.5 L ** Straight-4 ***U - 1.5/1.6/1.7 L ***D4B- 2.0/2.2 L *** R - 2.0/2.2 L ***A 2.5 L ***J- 2.9 L ***G- 4.0 L ** I6 ***G4B 5.9 L ***H- 10 L ***Powertech 12 L ***KK/KK- 6.6 L ***GG-BK- 11 L ** V6 *** S - 3.0 L ** V8 ***D8A - 16/18 L ==See also== * List of Hyundai transmissions *List of Hyundai vehicles *Hyundai *ICE * Hyundai
title: List of Hyundai engines
